title: MiLB Standings Top Filter
custom_preconds: Given the user is on milb/standings page
custom_steps: When the user lands on page
custom_expected: Verify that four (4) dropdowns appear (year, league, season, and division) and that the standings table can be filtered based on the values selected.

title: MiLB Standings Top Filter update
custom_preconds: Given the user is on milb/standings page
custom_steps: When the user selects a year 2019

title: MiLB Standings Year filter
custom_preconds: Given the user is on milb/standings page
custom_steps: When the user opens year filter
custom_expected: Verify that in the year filter the values range from 2021 - 2005 (descending).

title: MiLB Standings League Filter
custom_preconds: Given the user is on milb/standings page
custom_steps: When the user selects a year 2019

title: MiLB Standings Team Info
custom_preconds: Given the user is on milb/standings page
custom_steps: When the user lands on page
custom_expected: Verify that within the team column each team has a team logo, and the full name of the club and its organization affiliation.

title: MiLB Standings Team page
custom_preconds: Given the user is on milb/standings page
custom_steps: When the user clicks on a team
custom_expected: Verify that the user is navigated to the team page.

title: MiLB Standings Team mobile
custom_preconds: Given the user is on milb/standings page via mobile
custom_steps: When the user lands on page
custom_expected: Verify logo and tri-code are displayed.

title: MiLB Standings Next Game
custom_preconds: Given the user is on milb/standings page via mobile
custom_steps: When the user lands on page
custom_expected: Verify that the Next Game of each team is displayed in the Next Game column.

title: MiLB Standings Next Game click
custom_preconds: Given the user is on milb/standings page via mobile
custom_steps: When the user clicks on next game
custom_expected: Verify that Next Game link is clickable and opens Gameday to that actual game in the same tab

title: MiLB Standings Heading
custom_preconds: Given the user is on milb/standings page via mobile
custom_steps: When the user lands on page
custom_expected: Verify that the Standings heading exists.

title: MiLB Standings Last Updated
custom_preconds: Given the user is on milb/standings page via mobile
custom_steps: When the user lands on page
custom_expected: Verify Line item for Last Updated is displayed

title: MiLB Standings No Standings
custom_preconds: Given the user is on milb/standings page via mobile
custom_steps: When the user lands on page
custom_expected: Verify that if there are no Standings results for a set of criteria selected by a user a message appears.
